LanguageData.VFEArch_PlayerBrokenAsphalt.label: розбитий асфальт
LanguageData.VFEArch_PlayerBrokenAsphalt.description: Old, broken apart asphalt, often found in the form of ancient highways around abandoned locations. Very easy to traverse for people and vehicles alike.
LanguageData.VFEArch_PlayerPackedDirt.label: грунтовка
LanguageData.VFEArch_PlayerPackedDirt.description: Packed dirt, slightly enhancing movement speed, often forming paths around places of interest.
